ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 673
ygData.msgSnippet: I find Lament great for getting past casters that see invis This is especially useful in Sol A, to get to the Zone near the Foreman/Efreeti area you have to
ygData.messageBody:
I find Lament great for getting past casters that "see invis"

This is especially useful in Sol A, to get to the Zone near the
Foreman/Efreeti area you have to pass alot of crap, this is ok if none of
the mobs are casters but you can guarentee 9 times out of 10 there will be
at least 1 Wizard or Shamen in your way. Just drop invis, Lament the cast,
then stroll past it.

No need to clear trash, and you can get to the good spawns at full
health/mana =)

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 35 Songs - Veeshan

Ps, been residing in Kedge the last few days, exp is great there and it's
good fun. Anyone know what kind of good stuff drops there? Our group have
been as low as the 2nd level and it's damn scary. We killed a Cauldron
shark and then a Hammerhead shark spawned in it's place, it was red a level
38 so I am wondering if it's a named mob that drops something good.


-----------------------------------------------------

Lament worked fine, pathing is goofy there. If you
lament the 4 static lizzies near the temple steps (2
silver guards, 2 prot/sent/fan/heralds) and pull one
by the door, it will path right over the lizard
opposite of it. Without lament, you'd get all 4. I
usually pulled for my party, from the temple into the
"fishbowl" as we called it. (You called it the arena).
We were lvl 25-29 at the time, and a roamer could hurt
us bad. We would get 2 lizzies at a time, sometimes 3,
still easily managable. Lament was great for us, and
it works everywhere in Cazic.



Double Entendre
